text: Antonio Jos√© Brack Egg (3 June 1940 - 30 December 2014), was a Peruvian agronomist engineer, an ecologist, and researcher. He was the first Peruvian Minister of the Environment. Egg died after a brief hospitalization in Lima, Peru, aged 74. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Peruvian politicians Category:Peruvian engineers
title: Antonio Brack Egg
